event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the MaliGP2 was active.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, vertex shader
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the vertex shader unit was active.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, vertex storer
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the vertex storer unit was active.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, vertex loader
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the vertex loader unit was active.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Cycles vertex loader waiting for vertex shader
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the vertex loader was idle while waiting on the vertex shader.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Words read, system bus
event.description: Total number of 64 bit words read by the GP2 from the system bus per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Words written, system bus
event.description: Total number of 64 bit words written by the GP2 to the system bus per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Read bursts, system bus
event.description: Number of read bursts by the GP2 from the system bus per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Write bursts, system bus
event.description: Number of write bursts from the MaliGP2 to the system bus per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Vertices processed
event.description: Number of vertices processed by the MaliGP2 per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Vertices fetched
event.description: Number of vertices fetched by the MaliGP2 per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Primitives fetched
event.description: Number of graphics primitives fetched by the MaliGP2 per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Primitives culled
event.description: Number of graphics primitives discarded per frame, because they were seen from the back or were offscreen.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Commands written to tiles
event.description: Number of commands (8 Bytes, mainly primitives) written by GP2 to the PP input data structure per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Memory blocks allocated
event.description: Number of overflow data blocks needed for outputting the PP input data structure per frame .

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Vertex loader cache misses
event.description: Number of cache misses for the vertex shader's vertex input unit per frame.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, vertex shader command processor
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the GP2 vertex shader command processor was active. This includes time waiting for semaphores.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU command processor
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the MaliGP2 PLBU command processor was active. This includes time waiting for semaphores.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active Cycles, PLBU list writer
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the MaliGP2 PLBU output unit was active. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU geometry processing
event.description: Number of cycles per frame the MaliGP2 PLBU was active, excepting final data output. In other words: active cycles through the prepare list commands. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU primitive assembly
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU doing primitive assembly. This does not include scissoring or final output. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU vertex fetcher
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU fetching vertex data. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, Bounding-box and command generator
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU setting up bounding boxes and commands (mainly graphics primitives). This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, Scissor tile iterator
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU iterating over tiles to perform scissoring. This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx VP
event.name: Active cycles, PLBU tile iterator
event.description: Number of active cycles per frame spent by the MaliGP2 PLBU iterating over the tiles in the bounding box generating commands (mainly graphics primitives). This includes time spent waiting on the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Active clock cycles
event.description: Active clock cycles, between polygon start and IRQ.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Total bus reads
event.description: Total number of 64-bit words read from the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Total bus writes
event.description: Total number of 64-bit words written to the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Bus read request cycles
event.description: Number of cycles during which the bus read request signal was HIGH.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Bus write request cycles
event.description: Number of cycles during which the bus write request signal was HIGH.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Bus read transactions count
event.description: Number of read requests accepted by the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Bus write transactions
event.description: Number of write requests accepted by the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Tile writeback writes
event.description: 64-bit words written to the bus by the writeback unit.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Store unit writes
event.description: 64-bit words written to the bus by the store unit.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture cache uncompressed reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus into the uncompressed textures cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Polygon list reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus by the polygon list reader.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: RSW reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus into the Render State Word register.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Vertex cache reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus into the vertex cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Uniform remapping reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus when reading from the uniform remapping table.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Program cache reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus into the fragment shader program cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Varying reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words containing varyings generated by the vertex processing read from the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture descriptors reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words containing texture descriptors read from the bus.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture descriptor remapping reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus when reading from the texture descriptor remapping table.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Load unit reads
event.description: Number of 64-bit words read from the bus by the LOAD sub-instruction.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Polygon count
event.description: Number of triangles read from the polygon list.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Pixel rectangle count
event.description: Number of pixel rectangles read from the polygon list.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Lines count
event.description: Number of lines read from the polygon list.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Points count
event.description: Number of points read from the polygon list.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Stall cycles PolygonListReader
event.description: Number of clock cycles the Polygon List Reader waited for output being collected.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Stall cycles triangle setup
event.description: Number of clock cycles the TSC waited for input.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Quad rasterized count
event.description: Number of 2x?2 quads output from rasterizer.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Fragment rasterized count
event.description: Number of fragment rasterized. Fragments/(Quads*4) gives average actual fragments per quad.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Fragment rejected fragment-kill count
event.description: Number of fragments exiting the fragment shader as killed.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Fragment rejected fwd-fragment-kill count
event.description: Number of fragments killed by forward fragment kill.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Fragment passed z/stencil count
event.description: Number of fragments passing Z and stencil test.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Patches rejected early z/stencil count
event.description: Number of patches rejected by EarlyZ. A patch can be 8x8, 4x4 or 2x2 pixels.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Patches evaluated
event.description: Number of patches evaluated for EarlyZ rejection.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction completed count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instruction words completed. It is a function of pixels processed and the length of the shader programs.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed rendezvous count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed Rendezvous.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed varying-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed varying operation.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed texture-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed texture operation.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed load-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed load operation.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed tile read-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed read from the tilebuffer.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Instruction failed store-miss count
event.description: Number of fragment shader instructions not completed because of failed store operation.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Rendezvous breakage count
event.description: Number of Rendezvous breakages reported.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Pipeline bubbles cycle count
event.description: Number of unused cycles in the fragment shader while rendering is active.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture mapper multipass count
event.description: Number of texture operations looped because of more texture passes needed.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture mapper cycle count
event.description: Number of texture operation cycles.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Vertex cache hit count
event.description: Number of times a requested vertex was found in the cache (Number of vertex cache hits).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Vertex cache miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested vertex was not found in the cache (Number of vertex cache misses).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Varying cache hit count
event.description: Number of times a requested varying was found in the cache (Number of varying cache hits).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Varying cache miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested varying was not found in the cache (Number of varying cache misses).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Varying cache conflict miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested varying was not in the cache and its value, retrieved from memory, must overwrite an older cache entry. This happens when an access pattern cannot be serviced by the cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture cache hit count
event.description: Number of times a requested texel was found in the texture cache (Number of texture cache hits).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture cache miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested texel was not found in the texture cache (Number of texture cache misses).

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Texture cache conflict miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested texel was not in the cache and its value, retrieved from memory, must overwrite an older cache entry. This happens when an access pattern cannot be serviced by the cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Compressed texture cache hit count
event.description: Number of times a requested item was found in the cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Compressed texture cache miss count
event.description: Number of times a requested item was not found in the cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Load/Store cache hit count
event.description: Number of hits in the load/store cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Load/Store cache miss count
event.description: Number of misses in the load/store cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Program cache hit count
event.description: Number of hits in the program cache.

event.title: Mali-4xx FP
event.name: Program cache miss count
event.description: Number of misses in the program cache.

event.name: Writes NoSnpFull
event.description: Number of external WriteNoSnpFull transactions

event.name: Writes NoSnpPtl

event.name: Write
event.description: Number of external write data beats

event.title: Mali L2 Cache Stall

event.description: Number of cycles write data (W) is stalled

event.description: Number of external write transactions when the write buffer is 0-25% full

event.description: Number of cycles external snoop requests are stalled

event.description: Number of external snoops that hit a clean line in the Level 2 cache

event.name: Ext Snoop hit data
event.description: Number of external snoops that hit in the Level 2 cache and return data

event.title: MVE-V500 Stats
event.name: Samples
event.description: The number of times we have taken a sample

event.title: MVE-V500 Input Totals
event.name: Queued input-buffers
event.description: The number of input-buffers that has been queued for consumption by the MVE

event.title: MVE-V500 Input Totals
event.name: Consumed input-buffers
event.description: The number of input-buffers that has been consumed by the MVE and returned to the application

event.title: MVE-V500 Output Totals
event.name: Queued output-buffers
event.description: The number of output-buffers that has been queued for usage by the MVE

event.title: MVE-V500 Output Totals
event.name: Consumed output-buffers
event.description: The number of output-buffers that has been consumed by the MVE and returned to the application

event.title: MVE-V500 Stats
event.name: Created Sessions
event.description: The number of created sessions throughout the lifetime of the process

event.title: MVE-V500 Sessions
event.name: Active Sessions
event.description: The number of currently existing sessions

event.title: MVE-V500 Stats
event.name: Processed Frames
event.description: The number of processed frames. A processed frame is one where the encode or decode is complete for that particular frame. Frames can be processed out of order so this is not the same as the number of output-buffers returned

event.title: MVE-V500 Input Totals
event.name: Input Flushes Requested
event.description: The number of requested flushes of the input queue

event.title: MVE-V500 Input Totals
event.name: Input Flushes Complete
event.description: The number of completed flushes of the input queue

event.title: MVE-V500 Output Totals
event.name: Output Flushes Requested
event.description: The number of requested flushes of the output queue

event.title: MVE-V500 Output Totals
event.name: Output Flushes Complete
event.description: The number of completed flushes of the output queue

event.title: MVE-V500 Output
event.name: Queued Output Buffers (current)
event.description: The number of output-buffers that are currently queued for usage by the MVE

event.title: MVE-V500 Input
event.name: Queued Input Buffers (current)
event.description: The number of input-buffers that are currently queued for consumption by the MVE

event.title: MVE-V500 Output
event.name: Output Queue Flushes
event.description: The number of pending flushes for the MVE output-queue

event.title: MVE-V500 Input
event.name: Input Queue Flushes
event.description: The number of pending flushes for the MVE input-queue

event.title: MVE-V500 Stats
event.name: Errors encountered
event.description: The number of errors encountered

event.title: MVE-V500 Bandwidth
event.name: Bits consumed
event.description: The number of bits consumed during decode

event.title: MVE-V500 Bandwidth
event.name: AFBC bandwidth
event.description: The amount of AFBC-encoded bytes read or written

event.title: MVE-V500 Bandwidth
event.name: Bandwidth (read)
event.description: The amount of bytes read over the AXI bus

event.title: MVE-V500 Bandwidth
event.name: Bandwidth (write)
event.description: The amount of bytes written over the AXI bus

event.title: MVE-V500 Sessions
event.name: Session created
event.description: Generated when a session has been created

event.title: MVE-V500 Sessions
event.name: Session destroyed
event.description: Generated when a session has been destroyed

event.title: MVE-V500 Frames
event.name: Frame Processed
event.description: Generated when the MVE has finished processing a frame

event.name: Output buffer received
